text: Scott Menaged ( Photo : Discovery Channel ) A former real - estate investor and ` ` Property Wars'' star was sentenced to 17 years in prison for involvement in multiple fraud schemes that targeted more than 200 victims and resulted in more than $ 30 million in losses, the U. S. Attorney's Office in Arizona said Tuesday. Scott Menaged, 40, had previously pleaded guilty to bank fraud, money laundering and aggravated identity theft, the office said. Menaged operated a real - estate investment business and retail furniture stores in Phoenix, the office said. He had also appeared on the Discovery Channel's ` ` Property Wars.'' Embezzled money supported'lavish lifestyle'The office said Menaged embezzled millions of dollars in loans meant for real - estate purchases, provided fake real
